bs-distributionconnector-default-user-ap:
Mail subject line for when the user approval workflow finishes.
$1 - Page name

Mail body text for when the user approval workflow finishes.
* $1 - Start date
* $2 - Finish date
* $3 - Page name
* $4 - Revision ID
* $5 - Name of assigned user
* $6 - Instructions for assigned user
* $7 - Feedback of assigned user, includes result of vote
* $8 - initiator of workflow
bs-distributionconnector-default-documen:
Mail subject line for when the expert document control workflow finishes.
$1 - Page name

Mail body text for when the expert document control workflow finishes.
$1 - Start date
$2 - Finish date
$3 - Page name
$4 - Revision ID
$5 - Name of editor
$6 - Name of user, assigned to review
$7 - Name of user, assigned to approval
$8 - Instructions for editor
$9 - Instructions for user, who does review
$10 - Instructions for user, who does approval
$11 - List of feedbacks of assigned users, including their votes
$12 - initiator of workflow
bs-distributionconnector-default-user-vo:
Label 'delegated to {SomeUser}' in default workflow definition report, for workflow activities which can be delegated (like user vote).
$1 - which, who activity was delegated to
bs-distributionconnector-default-definit: Label 'Review' in default workflow definition report

Label 'Approve' in default workflow definition report

{{Identical|Approve}}
Label 'vote' in default workflow definition report, for activities which collect votes from users
